attributes.action: We Don't Want to Fund the Opposition in Syria
attributes.additional_details: We, the public, do not wish for our government to fund any opposition efforts in Syria.  Apart from the fact that we should not be meddling in the internal affairs of other countries - especially countries that we have no mutual ties with or long standing allegiance, you are proposing to fund what some countries consider a terrorist organisation when you claim not to be able to afford to bring back equipment from Afghanistan.
